name: Lost Adventurer
description:
Lost Adventurer - WGJ#80
You are a small squid adventurer who is lost in the dark labyrinth. Can you find the treasure that will hopefully help you escape the darkness?

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #80 (theme: Winning is Losing)

Credits:
Programmer: Mekyi
3D modeling: DFG
Music: azemazer
